title: Daniel Lubetzky, Founder Of KIND Healthy Snacks
teaser: Host Jessica Harris Speaks with Daniel Lubetzky, the founder of KIND Healthy Snacks, a natural food company in New York. Harris also speaks with sculptor Andy Goldsworthy.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris Speaks with Daniel Lubetzky, the founder of KIND Healthy Snacks, a natural food company in New York. Harris also speaks with sculptor Andy Goldsworthy.
